title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Solana (SOL) Drops 2.1% as Index Trades Lower
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Aave (AAVE) was also among the underperformers, declining 1.8% from Tuesday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3271.42, down 0.8% (-26.09) since 4 p.m. ET on Tuesday.

Eleven of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: UNI (+5.5%) and DOT (+1.3%).
Laggards: SOL (-2.1%) and AAVE (-1.8%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is trading lower with more assets declining than rising, led by significant drops in SOL and AAVE.
